body.name: 70mai Dash Cam Lite, 1080P Full HD, Smart Dash Camera for Cars, Sony IMX307, Built-in G-Sensor, 130° Wide Angle FOV, WDR, Night Vision, Loop Recording
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Ultra 1080P Full HD Video】The 70mai dash cam has 1080P HD picture quality to clearly capture license plates, road signs and preserve more detailed evidence. This means that you can immerse yourself in your journey and record video just as you see it in your eyes

【Enhanced Night Vision With Sony Image Sensor】Equipped with the Sony image sensor, this car dash cam can power high-quality performance in any lighting conditions. With the WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) technology, the 70mai Dash cam Lite solves the problem of underexposure or overexposure in both dark and bright light environments, which solidly provides stable performance even at night, that car camera is your loyal car guard

【Instant Evidence Straight to Your Phone】70mai APP needs to be used with the hotspot pairing feature enabled by the camera. After connecting, dash cam Lite all seamlessly transmits live feeds to your phone (remote operation is not supported), so video evidence is always at a glance if you need it

【Video Evidence for Potential Safety Risks】With an integrated G-sensor with adjustable sensitivity, Dash Cam automatically locks on live video in case of collision or crash. The accident scene can be authentically recreated for your peace of mind. (Required with a hardwire kit and parking monitor mode active, not included)

【Automatically Overwriting With Loop Recording】The dash cam automatically overwrites the oldest videos with the latest ones. The videos can be automatically saved and stored locally on a microSD memory card while driving, which ensures the video evidence will be captured and safely secured from overwriting. It supports high-endurance Class 10 (and above) microSD memory cards from 16GB up to 64GB (not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: No complaint's, this is the second one I have. I have the front/rear in my truck with the full voltage sense add-on and it works great. This is for my motorcycle. Although not waterproof, it rarely rains here in California and it comes off easily. No hassle low profile installation, reliable operation, and good video quality. I had to disable the G sensor so it wouldn’t think every pothole was an accident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cam but difficult app!
reviews.reviewText: I was about to send it back because I was having so much trouble with the App, but once installed in my car I realized you do not need the app to operate the cam, it automatically starts recording when the car is stared and voltage is supplied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value with adequate Video Quality
reviews.reviewText: This 70mai Dash Cam ‘Lite’ is very easy to use and is offered at reduced prices.Pluses:1. CAM will store about 4-8 day’s of driving video’s on a 64GB Micro SD card (about 10hrs of video recordings). Older files will be automatically overwritten. Individual photos can also be generated on demand. User has to supply the SD Card. Files have user-friendly date/time names and are arranged in well-named folders.2. Video quality is good for both day and night conditions. Can read license plates at 1-2 car length distances.3. User friendly features and software including Audio alerts and announcements: The CAM generates a WiFi HotSpot and connects to your smartphone ‘70mai’ App where you can get real-time video, download/playback photos & videos, etc.Issues:1. Don’t use the ‘Electrostatic’ Sticker; it will hold for only a few hours even after carefully wetting the mating surface with the windshield with window cleaner. Attach the unit directly to the windshield with the supplied sticker.2. At first use, Low battery warnings occurred when vehicle was powered off. I connected the USB power plug into a USB Power Bank overnight while the CAM was in ‘Parking Surveillance’ mode to resolve this (I assume the new unit needed time to fully charge the internal battery).3. Tiny paper manual is useless. The online manual is much better.4. The video files take several minutes to download via Wifi to your phone. It is much faster to download from the Micro SD card to a computer via a SD reader.The details:When the car’s USB or Power port is active, the camera starts recording and will store in 1, 2 or 3 minute sequential clips. Each file has a date/time label. Three minute files are about 300MB large.When power source is stopped, the unit uses it’s internal battery to stop and store. If parking mode is enabled, the unit will automatically generate a new video if there is movement in the camera field. It is also supposed to record if the built-in accelerometer detects a collision/bump. The battery has about 30minutes capacity. Typical power consumption was about 0.8Amps at 5V. The camera will power-off if there is no movement detected for 30minutes (this ensures that the car battery is not drained if the car’s Power Source is always on).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best bang for buck
reviews.reviewText: pic quality 7/10day 8/10night 6/10feels durable.super basic and simple as well as the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars New 70mai Dash Cam Lite cannot format any qualified known good microSD cards
reviews.reviewText: I bought this new 70mai Dash Cam Lite and two SanDisk High Endurance 64GB microSDXC cards on October 11, 2023 as a gift.When setting up the dash cam today (Friday, Nov. 24) first time, it failed to format either one of the SD cards and cannot recognize any known good C10/U3-rated SD cards but keeps saying "The SD card is damaged. Please change the SD card to continue recording."I tried their Customer Service USA phone number listed on their website but that number was not working at all (yes I was calling within their business hours), so then I submitted a message on their website and am waiting for a response.By the way, I know it's my negligence that I should have tested the device (ANY Newly Ordered Devices, to be precisely) within 30 days in case it's a DOA. So now in this case I am hoping to get a replacement from 70mai. Lesson is learned and remembered! However, I have another Dash Cam Lite of the same model that was bought last year and it's working with the new SD cards. So the problem is not on the SD cards.* Update - On Nov 28, 2023, I received the odd reply from 70mai Customer Service and it reads:Thank you for getting back to us.Could you please try another brand sd card?Like Samsung. We recommend using Samsung EVO Plus U3 if you don’t have anything in mind.I checked Amazon website and 70mai website, and nowhere they mentioned anything about using the "preferred" Samsung SD card for their dash cam. Isn't the SanDisk High Endurance microSDXC card C10/U3 100 MB/s READ and 40 MB/s WRITE good enough??? Their response just doesn't feel right! Besides, I already told the Customer Service that my old Dash Cam Lite (bought in 2022) works fine with these SanDisk SD cards without any issues.* Update - On Nov 29, 2023, after emailing back and forth with 70mai Support and providing them with photos of this DOA device and Amazon invoice, I received even odd and contradictory replies from them -JL: I bought it at Amazon.com just last month (October 11, 2023) and Amazon's Customer Service pointed me to you / 70mai Support because it is under 70mai's one-year warranty. Attached PDF is the Amazon invoice for my order.70mai Support: I checked that warranty of your order has expired. Hope you could understand.JL: No, I don't understand. How long is your warranty for Dash Cam Lite?70mai Support: one year limitedI am so speechless now. Just unbelievable! Is 70mai a trust-worthy company? Is 70mai qualified to continue selling products at Amazon? What else can a consumer like me do?* Update - Late on Nov 29, 2023, after questioning the 70mai Support why my order date "October 11, 2023" is beyond their One-Year Limited support, I received this reply:70mai Support: Okay,sorry my bad. i thought it was 2022.Ok, I think I have mentioned at least 5 times throughout my communications with them that I bought it just last month, October 11, 2023. So, I am speechless again.Final update - On Nov 30, 2023, the Support agreed to arrange a replacement. I asked for the tracking number and the Support replied saying they will send it over once they have it. I NEVER received the tracking number BUT received the replacement itself on Dec 2 which formatted the SanDisk High Endurance C10/U3 microSD cards just fine. Oh well, at least I got a replacement that was working out of the box.* My suggestion is: if you have a 70mai dash cam that should fail within a year, then you certainly have the rights to request a replacement, but better be firm and prepared to spend some time for emailing back and forth with their Support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, always are recording (include when is parking) and is easy to connect to phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is indeed a dash cam. It takes photos and videos, but many of the functions are just odd. You can’t truly power the unit off. You can’t silence the audio messages. If you start an emergency recording, you can’t stop it until it times out. It seems to have a remarkably weak back up battery because regularly reminds you to plug into power. While driving one day, it randomly when into parking surveillance mode.
Ich hatte einen Defekt an der Kamera 70Mai. Diese wurde sofort und ohne Schwierigkeiten ersetzt gegen ein neues Produkt.Auch die Kommunikation was sehr angenehm und einfach.5 Sterne ⭐️

reviews.reviewTitle: 単なる位置情報だけでなく、速度表示や日時自動更新機能もあるので非常に効果的。
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 一般的にドラレコ本体価格が数千円〜1万円のものでは、国内メ－カ－品であってもGPS機能やGセンサ－などが標準装備されているものは殆どない。今回新たに手配したドライブレコ－ダ－「70mai社のDash Cam Lite2」も同様に、録画映像に必要な最低限の機能しかなく、それ以外は必用に応じて追加オプションにより機能拡充していく廉価版機種であった。単なる録画映像だけではそれがいつどこで撮影されたかわからなくなってしまう。その映像自体に交通事故や事件などとの関連付けをするには、どうしてもGPS情報機能が必要不可欠となって来る! こうした背景から、同社製のドラレコ専用GPSアンテナを今回追加購入したのだが、価格自体はさほど高いものではなかった。GPS機能としては、走行速度と位置情報(緯度/経度表示)がリアルタイムで表示されて、録画データと共に記録してくれる。日時情報もGPSにより自動で補正されるので、手動調整の必要がないことも便利だ。自車の走行ル－トはスマホ専用アプリから地図上で確認することができて、走行軌跡として自動保存されていき履歴としても残る。映像録画にこれらGPS情報が加わればより信憑性の高いデ－タとして、警察や保険会社などに事故の際の有力な証拠物件として、ビデオ判定により立証することができる様になるのだ!このGPSアンテナも本体に接続するだけだが、コ－ドが長いため本体の電源ケ－ブルと同様に配線処理が必要となる。フロントガラス近くのダッシュボ－ドに粘着テ－プで貼付して、GPS電波を受信すればアイコンが右上に表示され、走行速度と位置情報(緯度/経度表示)、日時などが画面上に確認できるようになる。本商品の様にGPS機能が標準装備されてなければ、ドラレコとして最低限必要な機能になるので事前に準備しておきたい。

For a relatively cheap dash cam, it's- super easy to install- decent video quality (even at night)- has good extra functionality (emergency video, parking surveillance mode)- mobile app is goodOverall good product and great value for money
I've been using this for a while with absolutely no problems. It records very clear image.Great Car Cam. Thank you.
本体のみ先に買ったが、日付け表示位置情報が無いので後からGPS機を買った、自動日付けのはずだと思っていたが、2ヶ月たつが日付けが合わない？本体、GPSどちらかが不良品なのだろうか？両方とも返品したいが期限切れなのでしょうか？カー用品店で買えば良かったと思います、設定ミスでは、無いと思う。
